title: Profit of leading mutual property/casualty insurance companies 2018
summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Insurance Companies, and Profit in million U.S. dollars in each Insurance Companies on the y axis.
The Profit in million U.S. dollars is highest at Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. and lowest at Insurance Companies Farmers Insurance Exchange.
There is a difference of 8717.9 between the maximum Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. and minimum Insurance Companies Farmers Insurance Exchange.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Profit in million U.S. dollars for 8 number of Insurance Companiess.
The Profit in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. and lowest at Insurance Companies Farmers Insurance Exchange.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Insurance Companies, and Profit in million U.S. dollars in each Insurance Companies on the y axis.
The Profit in million U.S. dollars is highest at Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. and lowest at Insurance Companies Farmers Insurance Exchange.
There is a difference of 8717.9 between the maximum Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. and minimum Insurance Companies Farmers Insurance Exchange.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Insurance Companies in the x axis and Profit in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Profit in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. and lowest at Insurance Companies Farmers Insurance Exchange.
The second highest Profit in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Insurance Companies Auto-Owners Insurance.
The minimum Insurance Companies Farmers Insurance Exchange has got 124.66 times less Profit in million U.S. dollars than the maximum Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos..
Profit in million U.S. dollars at Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. is 8788.4 , second place is Auto-Owners Insurance at 754.5, and thirdly is Erie Insurance Group at 686.3.
The Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. has 6.15 times more Profit in million U.S. dollars than average.
